title: Dulce de leche bread
ingredients: ['450ml milk', '2 tablespoons vinegar', '625g plain flour', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '2 teaspoons salt', '30g dried active baking yeast', '225ml vegetable oil', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '350g dulce de leche (tinned caramel)', '1 beaten yolk, for brushing']
